smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'AddToHomeScreenDialogFragment' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'TestSharedPreferences' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: ThrowingExceptionsWithoutMessageOrCause
smells.description: A call to the default constructor of an exception was detected. Instead one of the constructor overloads should be called. This allows to provide more meaningful exceptions.

instances.message: A call to the default constructor of an exception was detected. Instead one of the constructor overloads should be called. This allows to provide more meaningful exceptions.

smells.name: FunctionMaxLength
smells.description: Function names should not be longer than the maximum set in the project configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: MemberNameEqualsClassName
smells.description: A member should not given the same name as its parent class or object.

instances.message: A member is named after the class. This might result in confusion. Either rename the member or change it to a constructor.

smells.name: TopLevelPropertyNaming
smells.description: Top level property names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private top level property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: context cannot be safely cast to Callbacks.
holder.findViewById(R.id.ask_for_rating_bar) cannot be safely cast to RatingBar.
findPreference(R.string.pref_key_category_ask_for_rating) cannot be safely cast to PreferenceCategory.
findPreference(R.string.pref_key_ask_for_rating) cannot be safely cast to AskForRatingPreference.
findPreference(R.string.pref_key_category_clipboard) cannot be safely cast to PreferenceCategory.
dialog cannot be safely cast to AlertDialog.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: ExpressionBodySyntax
smells.description: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

instances.message: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

smells.name: MandatoryBracesIfStatements
smells.description: Multi-line if statement was found that does not have braces. These should be added to improve readability.

instances.message: Multi-line if statement was found that does not have braces. These should be added to improve readability.
Multi-line else statement was found that does not have braces.These should be added to improve readability

smells.name: OptionalUnit
smells.description: Return type of 'Unit' is unnecessary and can be safely removed.

instances.message: The function setup defines a return type of Unit. This is unnecessary and can safely be removed.
The function release defines a return type of Unit. This is unnecessary and can safely be removed.
The function resume defines a return type of Unit. This is unnecessary and can safely be removed.
The function pause defines a return type of Unit. This is unnecessary and can safely be removed.

smells.name: NestedClassesVisibility
smells.description: Nested types are often used for implementing private functionality and therefore this should not be public.

instances.message: Nested types are often used for implementing private functionality. However the visibility of ResolverUseCase makes it visible externally.
Nested types are often used for implementing private functionality. However the visibility of IntentResolver makes it visible externally.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (Index("host", unique = true)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: Index("host", unique = true)

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function findFirstUrl has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.name: MaxLineLength
smells.description: Line detected that is longer than the defined maximum line length in the code style.

instances.message: Line detected that is longer than the defined maximum line length in the code style.
Line detected that is longer than the defined maximum line length in the code style.

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)

instances.message: The data class DisplayActivityInfo contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called packageName
The data class DisplayActivityInfo contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called intentFrom
The data class DisplayActivityInfo contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called componentName

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class CallerPackagePreferences defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class BrowserPreferences defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
